name: The Matagot
description:
Attentive, resourceful, severe, but fair. The Matagot doesn’t take anything nor anyone for granted, and knows everything comes with a price. Their peers aren’t going to help for the sake of being nice, and favors are simply another tacit type of currency.

The matagot is about balance and building trust, whether it is to build partnership, or simply making sure no one can bother you with their silly thirst for power over you.

The Matagot is a playbook for Monsterhearts 2.
